item.title: One Tech Tip: Hereâ€™s what you need to do before and after your phone is stolen or lost
item.description: Phones hold so much of our digital lives that if they ever get stolen or go missing, it can cause major disruption beyond just the loss of a device.

item.title: Alaska US Rep. Peltola and Republican opponent Begich face off in wide-ranging debate
item.description: Democratic U.S. Rep. Mary Peltola of Alaska and Republican Nick Begich have faced off in a wide-ranging debate.

item.title: AP Week in Pictures: Global
item.description: Oct. 4 - 10, 2024People across the world marked the one-year anniversary of the Oct. 7 Hamas attack on Israel.
